data.title: ... AND SMART GADGETS FROM THE CLEVER COUNTRY
data.meta_description: WHEN the horses flash past the winning post at Randwick in Sydney, one of the first acts of the stewards is to send blood and urine samples of the winners to the racecourse laboratories.
data.text:
WHEN the horses flash past the winning post at Randwick in Sydney, one of the first acts of the stewards is to send blood and urine samples of the winners to the racecourse laboratories.

But instead of chemical tests to look for hints that drugs have been used, tests long discarded as insufficiently sensitive, the Australian Jockey Club has a fearsome bank of mass spectrometers and gas chromatographs.
